Dear Littleton Families,
Thank you for your patience and support as we navigate through the school closure. As you are aware, Governor Ducey and Superintendent Hoffman announced a statewide closure of all schools until March 27th. During the closure, Littleton Elementary School District will be utilizing a curbside meal service for our students. We will be providing families with a food box containing five breakfast and five lunches on Wednesday, March 18th. These are available to all children 18 and younger. Families may stop by any of our schools between 4 and 6 pm to receive a food box to go. Children must be present to receive a meal. There will be no adult meals. Please note that school sites will be evaluated on a weekly basis. A second food box pick up has been scheduled for Wednesday, March 25th at the same time.
